title: Riot, I speak for everyone when I say this...
body:
I hope Taliyah isn't a sign of things to come. Please continue to make your female champs scantily-clad and well-endowed. As far as all your fans believe, Blood Moon Elise is the paradigm. Whoever drew that should be in charge of all female champion splash arts.

Thank you for always lending an ear to your community.

replies.body: Wut?
TLDR: OP mad cause no more fap material.

Haha, I identify as a straight male but I absolutely love the fact that not every champion is loaded with a massive rack and round thighs for all to see.  I adore Taliyah's design and more unique appearance.
Agreed.
Evelynn's new splash art...
{{champion:44}}  Is truely truely truely, outrageous.
Y no love for lolis? :'(
You've got 1 legit loli and a bunch of cute yordles, be happy.
Dunno about you but I like my girls with scales and/or smelling of bird.
since when were scales furry idiot
The furry fandom is in relation to anthropomorphs, which is any animal given human characteristics. They don't *have* to have fur to be considered furry.

Gonna drop a curve ball here and mention that im actually a furry who manages and owns a few furry communities.

Technically a scaled anthropomorphic is called a scalie, with that specific spelling, you can get away with calling it a furry for the most part if you want to associate furries with anthropomorphic in general but just watch out for them autists that get anal about it.

Now that, that factoid is out of the way lets do some damage control.

No i am not into beastiality, no i dont cringesuit (if i was to ever EVER wear a fursuit id atleast take the time to make it look legit instead of a cheap disney mascott costume, dont know how people can even be seen in that shit) and for god sakes we are not all gay neckbeard cringelords.

> [{quoted}](name=YellowBrickRoad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5a7Tf5Yb,comment-id=00010000000100000001,timestamp=2016-05-04T21:43:17.528+0000)
>
> Gonna drop a curve ball here and mention that im actually a furry who manages and owns a few furry communities.
> 
> Technically a scaled anthropomorphic is called a scalie, with that specific spelling, you can get away with calling it a furry for the most part if you want to associate furries with anthropomorphic in general but just watch out for them autists that get anal about it.
> 
> Now that, that factoid is out of the way lets do some damage control.
> 
> No i am not into beastiality, no i dont cringesuit (if i was to ever EVER wear a fursuit id atleast take the time to make it look legit instead of a cheap disney mascott costume, dont know how people can even be seen in that shit) and for god sakes we are not all gay neckbeard cringelords.

degenerate.
Id rather be a degenerate than a bloke with his head so far up his ass he cant smell the roses ;)

> [{quoted}](name=YellowBrickRoad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5a7Tf5Yb,comment-id=0001000000010000000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-05T03:44:25.136+0000)
>
> Id rather be a degenerate than a bloke with his head so far up his ass he cant smell the roses ;)

jokes on you, my head's so far up my ass its come out the other end.
wait. so you have sex with other people dressed as animals?
I know...
Hey hey, I said scales and bird, not furr and big ears, I aint no beastiality freak mate.

> [{quoted}](name=Gloric,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5a7Tf5Yb,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-04T05:34:21.411+0000)
>
> Hey hey, I said scales and bird, not furr and big ears, I aint no beastiality freak mate.

that still makes you a furry though.
it doesn't have to be fur and big ears. anything animal related makes you a furry.
It's a joke, not a dick, you know the rest of this phrase.

> [{quoted}](name=Gloric,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5a7Tf5Yb,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-04T06:09:33.134+0000)
>
> It's a joke, not a dick, you know the rest of this phrase.

"hur dur I was just pretending to be a degenerate"
w/ever furry degenerate. at least I know I'm not on the lowest rung of society.

> [{quoted}](name=A steezy Scizor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5a7Tf5Yb,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-04T06:49:30.057+0000)

at least you acknowledge you're being a prick, more than most can do

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5a7Tf5Yb,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-04T08:29:48.808+0000)
>
> at least I acknowledge I'm being a prick, more than most can do

you're right, that is more than most can do. good on you for acknowledging that.
OMG I OWN A CAT/DOG IMA FURRY OH NOE!

Have you noticed how the new or remade champions have skills that are derived from a combination of other champion or item skills? Here are some examples:

- Jhin traps
- Taliyah ult
- Taric ult
- Aurelion Sol Q
- Bard Ult

I think they ae just making the game easier to program, in all essence.
But yeah that new champion is real qt shame they have disgusting new rito meme kit with tons of un-needed bullshit

I WANT TO FCUK ELISE
{{champion:60}}
